testimonials.text: Been attending sessions with Eng. Mahmoud on a Revit course,  great deal of instructing techniques and concise style in delivering information. Also, noticed that eng. Mahmoud gives time to each candidate and builds upon their existing knowledge individually. Highly recommend üëçüèΩ
